Title: Part 13: Cirith Ungol
Text:
The old watchtower Cirith Ungol is probably still inhabited, I hear orcs fighting.
I should fight my way to the top. Maybe there is something interesting to get there that could help me with the journey.

>>(Kill the two orc leaders on the top of the tower)<<
CompleteText:
I fought my way through the orcs and killed the two orc leaders at the top.
Among their stolen treasures was Frodo's mithril mail.
It's light as a feather yet hard as dragon armor!
I could be a good use.

I should now continue on the path towards Mordor.
It's almost done! Hopefully we'll go unnoticed for the rest of our trip.
If we fail, all of Middle-earth is lost!
